channel.title: Blog on Taubin Drinks dot Beer
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Taubin Drinks dot Beer

item.title: Blog changes
item.author: admin@taubindrinks.beer (Dustin Plunkett)
item.description: Blog changes I’m making some changes to the blog, and moving it from wordpress to Hugo. There are many techinical reasons for this, which I will get to on my personal blog In the meantime, I need to change the posts so they are able to be posted properly in markdown format. The old posts and pages will be back, I promise. I will get them up as soon as I can, in the meantime if you have any questions or are looking for any of the old recipes, please email me at taubin at taubindrinks.

item.title: HBW â€“ Rest in Peace Paul Wicksteed (Time4Another1)
item.author: admin@taubindrinks.beer (Dustin Plunkett)
item.description: This week, the homebrewing community lost a prominent member. Paul Wicksteed, know by a lot of people as Time4Another1 passed away. Paul’s passing has been very shocking for all of us. My thoughts and prayers go out to Paul’s family and friends. The wounds will heal, even if they never go away. I hope wherever Paul is, the beer is some of the best he’s ever had. Rest in Peace friend, for now, it’s Time4Another1 in your honor.

item.title: HBW April 15 2015
item.author: admin@taubindrinks.beer (Dustin Plunkett)
item.description: It’s Wednesday, and that means, Home Brew Wednesday! In this HBW episode, I talk about my latest (as of yet un-named) beer, the Vanilla Java Stout, as well as a couple of the things that didn’t go entirely right with brewing this time around. Hold on to your shoelaces, it’s HBW for April 15th. Cheers! {{ < youtube CbRyScMNPCg >}}
